pages.text: Contraptions are moving multiblocks, designed entirely by you, using your imagination. The possibilites for contraptions are endless!  $(br2)$(l:transportation/trains)Trains$() are also contraptions.

For blocks to move together in an assembeled contraption, you must use Super Glue. Right-click two positions to glue everything between said to points together, and left-click while holding Super Glue to clear glued areas. $(ponder)
Mechanical Bearings attach to blocks in front of them. When provided with rotational force, a contraption will be assembled, and attached blocks will rotate. $(ponder)
When a redstone signal is provided, minecarts passing under the Cart Assembler will be turned into contraptions-on-rails. $(ponder)
Mechanical Pistons move glued structures in front of them, and can be extended with Piston Extension Poles. $(ponder)
Rope Pulleys move contraptions vertically. See also: a variant specifically for elevators called the Elevator Pulley. $(ponder)
